scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd lib/destack && npm run dev" "cd dev/nextjs-project && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd lib/destack && npm run build" "cd dev/nextjs-project && npm run build"
scripts.e2e:editor: concurrently -k "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cypress run -s 'tests/e2e/editor.spec.js'"
scripts.e2e:build: concurrently -k "npm run build && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cypress run -s 'tests/e2e/build.spec.js'"
scripts.test: npm run e2e:build && npm run e2e:editor
